title: Client Manager Agent
summary: Monitors Slack and email for client requests, auto-triages by urgency, drafts responses using conversation history, and schedules follow-ups. Response time drops from 30min to 3min.
details: A design agency saved 12 hours per week by implementing this agent. At $150/hr billing rate, that's $7,200/month in recovered capacity. They charge clients $1,200/month while API costs are only ~$60.

title: SEO Content Agent
summary: Automates keyword research, competitive analysis, and produces fully optimized SEO articles in 90 minutes instead of 6 hours. Handles 12-15 articles per week at $200 each.
details: Content marketing is a $45B industry. A single well-optimized article can drive $5,000+ in monthly organic traffic value. Operators use OpenClaw with SEO skills to produce content matching freelance writer quality.

title: Real Estate Data Agent
summary: Scrapes real estate listings, monitors price changes, and delivers structured data to clients. Initial project fee $500-1,500 plus $50-200/month recurring.
details: One operator built this in late 2025, reaching 7 clients ($8,400/mo) by January 2026, projecting 11 clients ($12,000/mo) by February. Low churn due to ongoing monitoring value.

title: LeadClaw Real Estate Edition
summary: Vertical AI wrapper built on OpenClaw for real estate agents. Automates lead generation from Facebook groups and Reddit communities. Charges $497/month per client.

title: Social Media Management Agent
summary: Automates content creation, comment replies, post scheduling, and engagement analytics for brands. Handles multiple platforms simultaneously.
details: Operators manage 5-10 brand accounts with a single OpenClaw setup. API costs per brand are minimal ($20-40/mo), making this one of the highest-margin services.

title: Custom Skill Development
summary: Develop and sell OpenClaw skills on ClawHub marketplace. Individual skills sell for $10-50, bundles for $50-200, and custom enterprise skills for $500-2,000.

summary: Help businesses set up, secure, and manage OpenClaw deployments. OpenClaw Pro reported $45,797 MRR as of Feb 2026.
